  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INfaWriter<TextRecord>

    public class TextWriter
extends AbstractNdefWriter<TextRecord>
    Author:
    jefBinomed INfaWriter for android application data. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if there is no locale, no encoding, no text or if the language data length exceed the expected size
